description: The Department of National Defense has a requirement to provide a Flight Data Monitoring (FDM) capability to meet the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) trial objectives.
full_summary:
#### Flight Data Monitoring Software Purchase
##### Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Number:** cb-4553-30643818
**Release Date:** 2023-04-03
**Closin Date:** 2023-05-30T14:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defense, 455 Blvd de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7, Canada

The Department of National Defense requires a Flight Data Monitoring (FDM) system to support the Canadian Armed Forces' trial objectives. The successful bidder will provide:

*   A web application for FDM analysts
*   Web hosting of flight data
*   Automated data processing
*   Customer service for the duration of the contract
*   One-time FDM analysis training session for CAF members

The services must be established for a duration of two calendar years for the following aircraft:

*   83x CH 146 Griffon
*   4x CT 142 Gonzo
*   4x CC 144 Challengers

**Attachments**

The tender documents, including solicitation amendment 6, are available for download from the CanadaBuys website: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4553/w3373-23-ga01_rfp_fdm_fr_5.pdf>

**Tender Requirements**

Bidders must comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

**Selection Criteria**

The Crown will award the contract based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements**

The Canadian government accepts bids from suppliers who comply with the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

Please refer to the tender documents for more information.
